testcase.name: Test the Login functionality of Practice Test Automation Application using valid data
testcase.system-out: Given open practicetestautomation...........................................passed When Enter valid Username as "student"......................................passed And Enter valid Password as "Password123"...................................passed And Click on submit.........................................................passed Then login page should be displayed.........................................passed

testcase.name: Test the Login functionality of Practice Test Automation Application using invalid data
testcase.system-out: Given open practicetestautomation...........................................passed When enter invalid username as "deepu"......................................passed And enter invalid password as "deepu123"....................................passed And Click on Submit.........................................................passed Then error msg should be displayed..........................................passed
